data.name: Phlegethon Demo
data.detailed_description:
Phlegethon - was one of the five rivers in the infernal regions of the underworld. You are here...
Try the demo version of the Phlegethon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB)
  • Storage: 173 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of explicit violence and gore. Dismemberment, a lot of blood and murder.
